name: Omega Chronos
description:
OMEGA CHRONOS

What happened to mankind? Why everything is silence? Who are you?

There is only silence. Even these artificial lights are dead. These walls, they are my prison? 

GAME CONTROLS 

[W/A/S/D] - Move Around

[Space] - Jump

[L-Shift] - Chrono Time

[Escape] - Pause

TIP: you can kill enemies with the enviroment

Trailer: 

Source files if you are interested: Github

If you want a complete visual experience, it's better download the game on your PC.
